title: Kare Kare (oxtail Stew)
summary: You can never have too many main course recipes, so give Kare Kare (oxtail Stew) a try. Watching your figure? This gluten free and dairy free recipe has 828 calories, 86g of protein, and 33g of fat per serving. This recipe serves 8 and costs $4.81 per serving. It can be enjoyed any time, but it is especially good for Autumn. 1 person has made this recipe and would make it again. If you have pepper, sauteed philippine shrimp paste, peanut butter, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. To use up the pepper you could follow this main course with the Easy Peppermint Dessert as a dessert. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes about 45 minutes. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 64%. This score is solid. Try Kare Kare (ox Tail And Peanut Stew) Recipe, KARI-KARE (Meat and Vegetable Stew in Peanut Sauce), and Kare-Kare for similar recipes.
